snippet: American officials said Israel carried out an air attack in Syria this month that targeted advanced antiship cruise missiles sold to the Syria government by Russia.
abstract: American officials say that Israel carried out airstrike in Syria that targeted advanced antiship cruise missiles sold to the Syrian government by Russia.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.

lead_paragraph: American officials said Israel carried out an air attack in Syria this month that targeted advanced antiship cruise missiles sold to the Syria government by Russia.

headline.main: Israel Airstrike Targeted Advanced Missiles That Russia Sold to Syria, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Israel Airstrike Targeted Advanced Missiles That Russia Sold to Syria, U.S. Says
